note:
🤗 Hi I'm Hilda!,

📲 I am a corporate communicator/PR expert with experience in events management and community engagement.

💻I spend hours in coffee shops writing and reading. 🦅 My passion is writing - as soon as I learned how to hold a pen, my parents started buying me notebooks to write my stories in!

❤️ My biggest achievement is how happy I am with my life at the moment.
